name: 马里乌斯·奥布隆
name_full: 马里乌斯·奥布隆 Marius Aubron
introduction: Marius Aubron is a young French-Japanese actor and fashion model. He has debuted in his first Japanese long-film Carton Moon and in Fantasmagorie the Ghost Show written and directed by Nikai Ken in 2021.Marius was born in Antigua & Barbuda, to a French father and Japanese mother. He has moved frequently between France and Japan as well as living in the Caribbean in his early ages and speaks French, Japanese, English, and additionally some German.At the age of 7, he is recruited by a talent hunter to star in the movie Carton Moon, and is quickly approached by many agencies before signing a contract with the well-known Japanese modeling agency Bon Image, Sugar Kids in Spain, and Teen in France.
